name: VantageInFusionSystemControl
0:
”Alexa, activate Start My Day.”
”Alexa, activate Goodnight.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Vantage InFusion system Control Skill enables you to connect your Alexa-enabled devices to your Vantage Infusion system. This Skill is designed for Vantage Infusion products. Vantage tasks are implemented with Alexa scenes and can be added to Alexa routines for a natural voice interface.
